## numberType() function

Create a union of number literal (i.e. `1 | 2 | 3`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function numberType<T extends number[]>(...value: T): IUnionType<NumberLiterals<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | <code>...number[]</code> A list of number literals |
